argument.name: keep
argument.description: .T. = Preserve the query, .F. = Discard the query if necessary.

page.description: If the index is a query, then set flag to indicate if it should stay around.
page.discussion: The .PERSIST() method sets a flag to indicate that a query that is used as an index should be preserved.
page.example: dim tbl as P dim indx as P tbl = table.open("customer") indx = tbl.index_primary_put("Lastname") indx.persist(.t.)
